Title: Relates to occupancy of joint living-work quarters for artists
Summary: Allows occupancy of joint living-work quarters in a city where such city's department of cultural affairs has failed to certify over fifty percent of such quarters over the prior ten years.
LawCode: Amd ยง277, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to occupancy of joint living-work quarters for artists
